title: 7 Atmospheric Mumbai Bars for an Unforgettable...
text:
3. Dome 
View, views, and more views are what you'll get at this sensuous and seductive rooftop bar. Come here to watch the sun set over Marine Drive (affectionately known as the Queen's Necklace for its sparkling row of lights) and linger on as stars and candles replace the fading sunlight in the open air lounge. Few places get to boast of such a beautiful setting. You'll enjoy the impressive selection of cocktails, wines, and cigars too. This bar is definitely for chilling out! Be prepared to pay for the experience though. Drinks are expensive and there aren't any happy hours. Address: Level 11, InterContinental Hotel , 135 Marine Drive, Mumbai. Ph: (22)3987-9999. Opening Hours: 6 p.m. until 1.30 a.m. Harbour Bar. Graham Crouch/Getty Images. 4. Harbour Bar 
Located in the lobby of the historic Taj Mahal Palace and Tower hotel , the cozy Harbour Bar has the distinction of being the first licensed bar in Mumbai. It opened in 1933 and looks out across the bay. These days, the bar wears a modern new look after undergoing renovations following the devastating terrorist attack at the hotel in 2008. Its creative menu features two nostalgic gin-based signature cocktails -- From the Harbour Since 1933 and The Bombay Blazer (served flaming). Surprisingly, there's even Pisco Sour, with origins in south America. Save money with happy hours from 6 p.m. until 8 p.m. Address: Opposite the Gateway of India, Colaba, Mumbai. Ph: (22)6665-3366. Opening Hours: 11 a.m. until 11.45 p.m. Gadda Da Vida. Novotel hotel. 5. Gadda Da Vida 
Want front row seats to a stunning sunset over Juhu beach ? Gadda Da Vida is the place! This chic sea lounge has both indoor and outdoor space, poolside and beachside under the palm trees. There are daily happy hours from 4 p.m. until 8 p.m., making this bar perfect for chilled-out sundowners. Come later in the night (from 10 p.m.) on Wednesdays, Fridays and Saturdays for DJs and dancing. Address: Novotel Hotel , Balraj Sahani Marg, Juhu, Mumbai. Ph: (22)6693-4444. Opening Hours: 2 p.m. until 1.30 a.m.
